revised_title: Harold Jeffreys: A Life of Scientific Pursuits and Discoveries
tldr: This article is a reminiscence of the life and scientific journey of Harold Jeffreys, a prominent geophysicist and dynamical astronomer. It covers his early interest in botany, his academic pursuits in mathematics and physics, and his contributions to the fields of geophysics and astronomy. The article also highlights his travels, visits abroad, and the impact of his work on various scientific disciplines.
